channel.title: Wtf? WDF!
channel.description: Alright, i was on thepiratebay website when i clicked on a torrent and it redircted me to a porn website. Luckily my mum wasn't upstairs or i'd be screwed. Does anyone know how this happened?

item.title: Wtf? WDF!
item.dc:creator: @BlazezFire BlazezFire
item.description:
@BlazezFire wrote:

Wrauld:

Alright, i was on thepiratebay website when i clicked on a torrent and it redircted me to a porn website. Luckily my mum wasn’t upstairs or i’d be screwed. Does anyone know how this happened?

Rofl just think if your mom was rich next to you.

Read full topic

item.title: Wtf? WDF!
item.dc:creator: @Cruzer Cruzer
item.description:
@Cruzer wrote:

[quote="`Worx, post:8, topic:250358"][quote author=Wrauld link=topic=330174.msg2579599#msg2579599 date=1229189615]
Alright, i was on thepiratebay website when i clicked on a torrent and it redircted me to a porn website. Luckily my mum wasn’t upstairs or i’d be screwed. Does anyone know how this happened?
[/quote]

That’s why thepiratebay is a free and open invitation website.

You should use demonoid.com, if your lucky enough to get an invite code. Their torrents are higher quality because of the closed-community and better moderation system.[/quote]
demonoid is practically dead

Read full topic

item.title: Wtf? WDF!
item.dc:creator: @_Worx `Worx
item.description:
@_Worx wrote:

Wrauld:

Alright, i was on thepiratebay website when i clicked on a torrent and it redircted me to a porn website. Luckily my mum wasn’t upstairs or i’d be screwed. Does anyone know how this happened?

That’s why thepiratebay is a free and open invitation website.

You should use demonoid.com, if your lucky enough to get an invite code. Their torrents are higher quality because of the closed-community and better moderation system.

Read full topic

item.title: Wtf? WDF!
item.dc:creator: @FastBallz FastBawlz
item.description:
@FastBallz wrote:

[quote=“stormcutter, post:6, topic:250358”][quote author=Wrauld link=topic=330174.msg2579704#msg2579704 date=1229198542]

You might have clicked an ad. There is no way thepiratebay would do such a thing. You could also have a virus.

I have Mcafee and AVG, i just did a virus scan…no viruses.
[/quote]

It is not recommended to have more than one anti virus at one time, as it will cause interference.[/quote]

Especially two bad ones.

Read full topic
